medi:segment.name: Beginning of message
medi:segment.medi:documentation: BGM, A segment to indicating the beginning of the message and identifying the consignment for which status is being requested.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment indicating the date/time of the message and the dates, times and periods relating to the requested status or events.

medi:segment.name: Place/location identification
medi:segment.medi:documentation: LOC, A segment identifying a place/location which applies to the consignment such as consignment origin and destination.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 1: A group of segments to specify a reference which applies to the whole message, and its related date and time.

medi:segment.name: Reference
medi:segment.medi:documentation: RFF, A segment to identify a reference relating to the requested status, e.g. customer reference number. Also a reference to previous message can be given.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment to indicate date and time relating to the reference.

medi:segment.name: Details of transport
medi:segment.medi:documentation: TDT, A segment identifying conveyance relating to the status or event such as flight, vessel/voyage.

medi:segment.name: Equipment details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: EQD, A segment identifying equipment related to the requested status or event such as a container.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 2: A group of segments to specify the parties related to the consignment.

medi:segment.name: Name and address
medi:segment.medi:documentation: NAD, A segment identifying a party to the consignment such as a shipper, consignee, freight forwarder, broker.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 3: A group of segments to indicate contacts related to the party.

medi:segment.name: Contact information
medi:segment.medi:documentation: CTA, A segment to identify a person or department to whom communication should be directed.

medi:segment.name: Communication contact
medi:segment.medi:documentation: COM, A segment to identify a communication number of a department or a person to whom communication should be directed.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 4: A group of segments to provide information about specific consignments, e.g. included in a consolidation.

medi:segment.name: Consignment information
medi:segment.medi:documentation: CNI, A segment to indicate a consignment (in a consolidation) using the reference number of its transport document.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment to indicate the date/time of the transport document of this consignment and the dates, times and periods relating to the requested status or events.

medi:segment.name: Place/location identification
medi:segment.medi:documentation: LOC, A segment identifying a place/location which applies to the consignment such as consignment origin and destination.

medi:segment.name: Reference
medi:segment.medi:documentation: RFF, A segment identifying a reference relating to the requested status, e.g. customer reference number/order.

medi:segment.name: Details of transport
medi:segment.medi:documentation: TDT, A segment identifying conveyance relating to the status or event such as flight, vessel/voyage.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 5: A group of segments to identify equipment and eventually the means of transport in which it is placed.

medi:segment.name: Equipment details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: EQD, A segment identifying equipment related to the requested status or event such as a container.

medi:segment.name: Transport placement
medi:segment.medi:documentation: TPL, A segment to identify a means of transport (e.g. train) to which the equipment is linked.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 6: A group of segments to specify the parties related to this consignment.

medi:segment.name: Name and address
medi:segment.medi:documentation: NAD, A segment identifying a party to the consignment such as a shipper, consignee, freight forwarder, broker.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 7: A group of segments to specify a goods item, necessary in cases where the request concerns only part of the consignment.

medi:segment.name: Goods item details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: GID, A segment to provide details of a goods item as part of a consignment.

medi:segment.name: Free text
medi:segment.medi:documentation: FTX, A segment to describe the goods item.

medi:segment.name: Split goods placement
medi:segment.medi:documentation: SGP, A segment to identify equipment in which goods are transported.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 8: A group of segments to indicate contacts related to the party.

medi:segment.name: Contact information
medi:segment.medi:documentation: CTA, A segment to identify a person or department to whom communication should be directed.

medi:segment.name: Communication contact
medi:segment.medi:documentation: COM, A segment to identify a communication number of a department or a person to whom communication should be directed.
